name: Kid'sColorIdentificationGame
0:
”Alexa, open Kid's Color Game”
”Alexa, play Kid's Color Game”
”Is it green?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kid's color game
des:
The Kid's Color Identification Game will ask your child to name the color of objects to help them recall an image of an object and its associated color. This will also help build on their listening and speaking skills.

This game will ask questions for 5 rounds each time and also confirm the correct color for the object asked so your child can learn.

To get started, say "Alexa, open Kid's Color Game" and say "yes" once you are ready to start. Alexa will ask for the color of a certain object and all your child will have to do is name the color.

We are constantly working on adding more objects to the game!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
